Translations.Text: Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Auuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen
wid iwumi seurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemees
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuoen sennig wiyav
Wid iwumi iweddeo laatab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi
Widak d wid i inekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mean igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra
Atan uqeiii nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaalken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet
Degs ad wekkoen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqao yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waabad n Mass is
Khiau
Asmekti ueunu n Mass ik, i umdan iS Zakarya
mi iger, i Mass is, ti$oi tabavnit
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, oeent laavam iw, aqeoou ioeq si ccib. A Mass iw! Anuju $uoeK uroin iyi isnu$ben
Nek ugade$ llzem iw, deffir i. Tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot. Efk iyi d lfeox s$uoeK
ad iyi iwoet, ad iwoet si twacult n Yaaqub. Err it, a Mass iw, d win iouvan
A Zakarya, s tidep, Nbecceo ik s uqcic, ism is Yeeya. Ur Nefki, i yiwen, ism agi, uqbel is
Inna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sau$ aqcic, tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot, u nek $emqe$ di tewser
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass ik: ayagi ishel fellI. Ni$ Xelqe$ k, zik, ur telliv d acemma
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d assekni". Inna: "assekni ik, ur tepmeslayev i medden, krav wavan, ur tuvnev
Iffe$ ed ar ugdud is, si lemqam. Iweeea yasen ad anzen uubee, tameddit
A Yeeya, eiief Tazmamt, s loehd". D uuebyan, Nefka yas uuwab
lmaenana akked uufawa, s$uone£. Ipeezzib
ibedd i imawlan is; ur illi d aqehhao ne$ d amaaui
Tifrat fellas asmi d ilul, asmi ara immet, asmi ara d iu$al d amuddir
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taazel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteo garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ooue nne£. £uoes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Eerz Uenin, segk, ma tepeezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iufan
Tenna: "amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aeunu s$uone£. D lameo ippueeppmen
